version_description:
Add Pet
Add costume price
Fix black market
Fix crash on low devices
Fix energy

- Add report hacked player button in Arena
- Cap healing effect of Hammer skill Rolling Smash
- Improve UI of Chest tab in Shop
- Improve UI of Level Up package
- Fix energy was not fully recharge
- Fix bugs and optimize performance
- Fix crash on some devices
- Rework Upgrade material, Reforge material and Reroll material bundles

Prepare for Costume big update
Fix many Arena issues
Fix bugs and optimize performance
Fix crash on some devices

Add ability to switch weapon in Adventure Mode
Add Bloody Grave to Adventure Mode
Add Social Network Login reward
Fix bugs and optimize performance
Fix crash on some devices

Fix Ancession Tower is stuck at loading
Fix Weapon Switch Auto mode
Fix Secret Shop incorrect data
Fix login with AppStore
Fix bugs and optimize performance

Add Workshop for crafting equipments
Update Daily Quest rewards
Update Daily Reward
Fix many bugs and optimize performance
Fix crash on some device
Next update: Legendary equipments

-Craft equipments in Workshop.
-Add Crafting and Enhancement material bundle.
-Update UI bundle in Shop
-Fix set bonus stat does not apply correctly
-Fix character falling underground
-Fix bugs and optimize performance
-Fix crash on some devices

- Unlock New Character Witch.
- Add legendary items for Witch.
- Add new costume for Witch.
- Fix daily quest Underground Investor
- Fix incorrect base stat of items below Legendary
- Fix bugs and optimize performance
- Fix crash on some devices
